orderly.translation[0].definitions[0].de: arranged or organized in a sensible or neat way
orderly.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The tools were arranged in orderly rows.
She needs to organize her ideas in a more orderly way.
orderly.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The elections were conducted in an orderly fashion.
They waited in a dignified and orderly manner outside the church.
orderly.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who does unskilled jobs in a hospital
orderly.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a soldier who does unskilled jobs
